name: OutofTime
description:
Andy the Cyborg finds himself in western-style environments and must use his ability to replicate himself so he can reach the things he needs to cope with his new situation the most, saloon whiskey and wine! 

Asset/Game Credits:

Mechanics code created by Micheal Baker - University of Texas at Austin

Cyborg Character created by Hadron Studios - Unity Asset store

Free Low Poly Desert Pack created by 23 Space Robots and Counting - Unity Asset Store

Low Poly Western saloon created by David Stenfors - Unity Asset Store
